huffman

Class HuffmanTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • huffman.HuffmanTreeNode

  • public class HuffmanTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
    One node in a Huffman tree.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int data
      For leaf nodes this is the character whose frequency is in question.
      HuffmanTreeNode left 
      HuffmanTreeNode parent 
      HuffmanTreeNode right 
      int sum
      For leaf nodes this is the frequency of the character.

    • Constructor Summary

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • parent

        public HuffmanTreeNode parent

      • left

        public final HuffmanTreeNode left

      • right

        public final HuffmanTreeNode right

      • data

        public final int data
        For leaf nodes this is the character whose frequency is in question. For other nodes it is unused.

      • sum

        public final int sum
        For leaf nodes this is the frequency of the character. For other nodes this is the cumulative sum of the sums of the child nodes.

               int data)
